author: feedback@businessinsider.com (Katie Canales), Katie Canales
title: Temperature sensors, fewer tables, and masked waiters: Here's what dining out could look like across the US when stay-at-home orders are relaxed
description: Jeff Chiu/AP California Gov. Gavin Newsom unveiled a plan Tuesday designed to eventually loosen stay-at-home restrictions in the state. The modifications hinge on six factors that need to be considered, but even if restrictions are relaxed, life still could l…
content:
As much of the country continues sheltering in place during the COVID-19 health crisis, many are wondering when the orders to stay home may lift and normal life could resume.
On Tuesday, California Gov. Gavin Newsom gave some indication of what that could lo… [+1822 chars]
